document_notes.text:
This update for ceph fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-12059: Fixed a denial of service caused by a specially crafted XML payload on POST requests (bsc#1170170).
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: An issue was discovered in Ceph through 13.2.9. A POST request with an invalid tagging XML can crash the RGW process by triggering a NULL pointer exception.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
